svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 22, 2022" date: "2022-10-22"
Eth News and Links
Layer 1
* Visualization of Tornado Cash transactions & MEV-Boost relays; guide to analyzing
MEV-Boost
* Ideas for next MEV-Boost features
* EIP4844 proto-danksharding progress update : targeting Shanghai upgrade, network
bandwidth testing will determine target blob sizes
* History of account abstraction
Research
* Vitalik updated paths to single slot finality
Client releases
* Execution layer: Besu v22.7.7 : memory & CPU performance improvements, reduces
exceptions, fix for GraphQL and patches Apache Commons Text CVE Erigon v2.28.1 : fixes
for empty proposed blocks and fix for potential deadlock
* Besu v22.7.7 : memory & CPU performance improvements, reduces exceptions, fix for
GraphQL and patches Apache Commons Text CVE
* Erigon v2.28.1 : fixes for empty proposed blocks and fix for potential deadlock
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.1.1 : sync committee improvements
* Lodestar v1.1.1 : sync committee improvements
Layer 2
* Polynya: protocols take time to mature , predicts 2024 at the earliest for a secure
decentralized rollup
EIPs/Standards
* EIP5787 : Digital identity
* EIP5791 : Physical Backed Tokens; Azuki PBT explainer
* EIP5792 : Wallet abstract transaction send API
* EIP5793 : eth/68: add tx type to tx announcement
* EIP5794 : eth/69: add withdrawals to block
* EIP5805 : Voting with delegation
* EIP5806 : Delegate transaction
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Mimic !
Does your DAO want to delegate treasury management but keep custody? Or trustlessly
automate your yield?
Check out our Smart Vaults to automate DeFi operations in a secure, trustless, and
non-custodial way.
For DeFi projects : you can also automate collecting your fees across chains and
swapping/distributing them.
Previously Mimic’s co-founders helped build POAP, Balancer, and OpenZeppelin, among
others. Backed by Starbloom Ventures.
Stuff for developers
* Open Etherscan verified contract in Remix by replacing domain in URL
* tincho: solutions to yet another EVM puzzle
* Cookbook : discoverable contracts with no-code deploy
* subway-rs : sandwich bot for Uniswap v2, implemented in Rust & Huff
* Fast G2 subgroup check in BN254
* zk-timelock : verifiable time-lock encryption using zk proofs, experimental with
benchmarks
Security
* Bond Protocol’s Ohm bond $292k exploit , no input validation, funds returned
* Timeless Bunni vulnerability fixed , initial deposits would have been at risk
* DXdao governance vulnerability disclosed , $80 million could be withdrawn
* Immunefi’s web3 security resources
Ecosystem
* Open Ethereum problems in game theory, mechanism design and economic modeling
* First month of negative ETH issuance
Application layer
* Lattice OPCraft : on-chain 3D voxel world built with MUD game engine on Optimism’s OP
Stack
* Sorare NBA five player fantasy game live, beta
* ENS POAP card : Devcon swag issued “I met” POAP claim codes via NFC
* NFT screens : display NFTs curated via Google Sheets
* Unstoppable domains stopping .coin support , offering credits
Job Listings
* Join Llama to help build the future of protocol DAOs: Solidity and Backend
* Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
* Remix: frontend React/Typescript dev
* Research scientist wanted for EF Robust Incentives Group
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to
abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Pay with one click using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* Draft DCCPA bill aims to kill DeFi in US; bill lobbied for by FTX/SBF
* beeple: switch NFT royalties from a sellers fee to a buyer’s premium
* Idea to use NFTs for positive-sum predictions
General
* Paul Brody: Ethereum killers are now all zombies
* Forbes: ByteDance planned to monitor the location of specific US TikTok users
* HyperPlonk with linear time prover: moves Plonk to the boolean hypercube, removes
need for using FFTs and eases parallelization
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-22-2022
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Oct 26-28 – Eth Panama
* Oct 28 – Semaphore grants deadline
* Oct 28-30 – ETH Lisbon
* Oct 31 – Merge data challenge deadline
* Oct 31-Nov 10 – Clr.fund LatAm round
* Nov 3 – US Treasury digital assets RFC [PDF] deadline
* Nov 4-6 – ETHSanFrancisco (ETH Global)
* Nov 11-13 – ETHBrno (Czech Republic)
* Nov 18-20 – Web3 Weekend (ETH Global)
* Nov 25-27 – ETH Vietnam
* Dec 1 – Columbia cryptoeconomics workshop (New York)
* Dec 2-4 – ETHIndia (ETH Global)
* Mar 2-5 – ETHDenver
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
Week in Ethereum News
